title: The Bruery (beer trade mark) font- help please, what´s this font???
content:
The Bruery (beer trade mark) font- help please, what´s this font???

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Brand - The Bruery\_0.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/typophile.com/files/Brand%20-%20The%20Bruery_0_0.jpg) | 115.45 KB |
author: cesarskydiver

comments.content: The closest I have may be [Casey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/casey). Some more in the same vein: [Licious Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/licious-script), [Ephemera LHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ephemera), [Fan Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/fan-script), [Ballpark Script LHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ballpark-script), [Chicago Script LHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/chicagoscript.php), [Mooshine Script NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf)

It seens that this font was custom created specially for The Bruery ...  
Anyway, the 1rst one is really close to it. Tks a lot !
